fields.Title: PLAZA / RENE WC HERO STORY
fields.Description: Red check to impress René with a hero-story of your own.

fields.Title: START
input
Inland Empire: "All of this, accompanied by a music..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All of this, accompanied by a musical composition telling of the heroism of old, when men were bigger in both body and heart. You feel strange kinship to this old soldier. You and him are the same now.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "He mumbled: "You certainly had me f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He mumbled: "You certainly had me fooled."

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
You: ""Telling.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Telling."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course not." He doesn't even lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course not." He doesn't even look up from his notebook.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""How so, then?" He leans in with hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How so, then?" He leans in with his hands on his hips.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: "The carabineer stares at you with a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The carabineer stares at you with a frown. Doesn't look like he's buying it.

fields.Title: medallionhub
Untitled hub
Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
You: ""He was screaming that I'm trying t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He was screaming that I'm trying to molest him, while I clearly wasn't."

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
You: ""It took us nearly seven hours. Fif..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It took us nearly seven hours. Fifi died in my arms, when the water was only knee deep... She was a good dog."

fields.Title: You: ""The Cyan Berets.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Cyan Berets."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""That's what I thought." He nods. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's what I thought." He nods. "We'll get back to our game now if you don't mind."

fields.Title: Drama: "But of course, sire. Looks like the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But of course, sire. Looks like they're waiting for you to speak.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Flashes of bloody and terrible scen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Flashes of bloody and terrible scenes of war. Men dying, horses shrieking, blood sinking into sand and snow and asphalt and fertile black earth...

fields.Title: You: ""Imagine just flickering into exist..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Imagine just flickering into existence from nothingness."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Sure, officer." Already he looks s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure, officer." Already he looks sceptical. "Let's hear your *take*."

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.rene_authority_honorable_thing"]
Variable["plaza.rene_authority_honorable_thing"]
!(Variable["plaza.rene_authority_honorable_thing"])
René Arnoux: "The old soldier shakes his head in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old soldier shakes his head in disapproval. "What do you want, officer?"

fields.Title: René Arnoux: "The man shakes his head, mumbling s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man shakes his head, mumbling something under his nose, then turns back to you: "Can we get back to our game now?"

fields.Title: You: ""Well..." (Drag out the pause.) "In..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well..." (Drag out the pause.) "In essence, yes."

fields.Title: You: ""For your information, alcoholism i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For your information, alcoholism is a terrible, debilitating ailment."

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.rene_threw_the_boule"]
Variable["plaza.rene_threw_the_boule"]
!(Variable["plaza.rene_threw_the_boule"])
Drama: "Unfortunately there doesn't seem to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unfortunately there doesn't seem to be anything worth mentioning among your achievements. You should resort to good old lying.

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
You: ""You're right, this isn't very beli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, this isn't very believable, is it?"

fields.Title: You: ""This information is classified.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This information is classified."

fields.Title: You: ""Harry's Hounds.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Harry's Hounds."

fields.Title: Untitled hub (02)
René Arnoux: ""Good call." Not a muscle in his fa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good call." Not a muscle in his face moves as he slowly nods. "Think we can get back to our game now?"

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Unless you wanna tell him how you t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unless you wanna tell him how you took Cuno down. The decisiveness you exhibited in that situation would surely impress a man fond of order and discipline.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""And I thought getting my knee shat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And I thought getting my knee shattered and surviving on rat carcasses in the trench was bad... here, have one of my medals! You've earned it, *officer*."

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
René Arnoux: ""You mean alcohol?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean alcohol?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
Drama: "Strange, he didn't buy it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Strange, he didn't buy it.

fields.Title: You: ""Imagine pain that makes giving bir..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Imagine pain that makes giving birth seem like a mosquito bite. But *inside your head*." (Point to your head.)

fields.Title: You: ""No, I have found *The Source*. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I have found *The Source*. The Source of The Flow. I have found... Al Gul."

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.rene_inland_youaresame"]
Variable["plaza.rene_inland_youaresame"]
!(Variable["plaza.rene_inland_youaresame"])
Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs audibly, but k..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant sighs audibly, but keeps his eyes on the notebook.

fields.Title: You: ""Actually I don't wanna resort to l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually I don't wanna resort to lying after all."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""We'll get back to our game now if..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We'll get back to our game now if you don't mind."

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, should I take it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, should I take it?"

fields.Title: You: ""How dare you belittle my voyage th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How dare you belittle my voyage through the void?!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You already threw their ball into..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You already threw their ball into the water, took a sandwich from one of them, and a medal from the other. What more could we possibly want? Perhaps we're done bullying these citizens?"

fields.Title: You: ""Imagine knowing nothing but the sw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Imagine knowing nothing but the sweet oblivion only to wake into unbelievable pain..."

fields.Title: Authority: "His tone is like that of a drill-se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His tone is like that of a drill-sergeant addressing new recruits.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Officer," he says with obvious dis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer," he says with obvious disdain, "this is unacceptable for anyone bearing an insignia. A man should lead by example, not terror."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Well, if you phrase it like that it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Well, if you phrase it like that it doesn't sound too good.

fields.Title: You: ""René..." (Lower your voice.) "I'm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "René..." (Lower your voice.) "I'm ex-army too. Special Forces. Black ops. Secret soldier."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Mhmh..." He nods. "We'll get back..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhmh..." He nods. "We'll get back to our game now if there isn't anything else?"

fields.Title: You: ""The boat capsized and sank. Fifi w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The boat capsized and sank. Fifi was already tired. She was almost 11. I took her on my back and started swimming..."

fields.Title: Drama: "Go long, go deep, go unconventional..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Go long, go deep, go unconventional!

fields.Title: You: ""SILENCE! You know not of which you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "SILENCE! You know not of which you speak! I have danced with Al Gul for one thousand nights!"

fields.Title: Authority: "This feels *honourable*. You did th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This feels *honourable*. You did the *right* thing not taking the medal. The *good* thing. Your chest is buzzing with pride.

fields.Title: You: ""Imagine waking up with a terrible..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Imagine waking up with a terrible headache."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Son..." He's slowly shaking his he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Son..." He's slowly shaking his head. "I don't know why you're feeding me this horse shit, but I'm not biting. Can we get back to our game now?"

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Are you asking me or telling me?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you asking me or telling me?"

fields.Title: You: "I'd rather just ask him some questi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'd rather just ask him some questions.

fields.Title: Drama: "Of course, it's your call. But he w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course, it's your call. But he would have been *really* impressed.

fields.Title: You: ""Look, I don't think anyone's ever..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, I don't think anyone's ever been so drunk. It must be a record."

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.rene_ency_orange_sun"]
Variable["plaza.rene_ency_orange_sun"]
!(Variable["plaza.rene_ency_orange_sun"])
Conceptualization: "The name echoes through the deep da..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The name echoes through the deep dark halls of history... it calls to you and your kin!

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. Alcohol.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Alcohol."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Feels as though you should do more..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Feels as though you should do more honourable things. As if there's some kind of a... secret reward. If you just commit enough honourable acts.

fields.Title: Drama: "He'll get it. Don't worry, just con..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He'll get it. Don't worry, just continue -- he's *gonna* be impressed.

fields.Title: You: ""... and realize your mind -- every..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... and realize your mind -- everything that was *you* -- is gone."

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
René Arnoux: ""The twelve-year-old junkie, whose..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The twelve-year-old junkie, whose alcoholic father beats him?" His eyes light up. "Why did you do that?"

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""If you don't have any more questio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If you don't have any more questions we'll return to our game now." By the looks of it he's still trying to wrap his head around what you told him.

fields.Title: Variable["yard.cuno_punched_cuno"]
Variable["yard.cuno_punched_cuno"]
!(Variable["yard.cuno_punched_cuno"])
Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
You: ""I uh... I had a dog -- 'Fifi'. Too..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I uh... I had a dog -- 'Fifi'. Took her fishing late one autumn but the boat rocked and she fell in, so I jumped after..."

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.rene_hero_Story_rc"]
Variable["plaza.rene_hero_Story_rc"]
!(Variable["plaza.rene_hero_Story_rc"])
You: ""... and realize the man-body, with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... and realize the man-body, with *you* in it, is just a husk now. All memories -- erased."

fields.Title: You: ""... and realize you've pushed your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... and realize you've pushed yourself too far. Past the point of no return."

fields.Title: You: ""I needed to make him respect me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I needed to make him respect me."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""I'll stop you right there, son." H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll stop you right there, son." He raises his hand. "I'm old, but I'm not stupid. I *know* a soldier when I see one."

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
René Arnoux: ""Was the vessel you boarded the 'HM..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was the vessel you boarded the 'HMS Commodore Red'?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think there was anything e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think there was anything else he wanted. Was there? You got the medal, now let's solve the crime."

fields.Title: You: ""I still feel terrible, René. Sickl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I still feel terrible, René. Sickly, panicky, outright sad -- you name it."

fields.Title: You: "Mumble incoherently."
fields.Dialogue Text: Mumble incoherently.

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
You: ""I'm talking about so much more tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm talking about so much more than that."

fields.Title: Jump to: [René Arnoux: ""And I thought getting my knee shat..."]
Reaction Speed: "Your sarcasm will be your undoing,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your sarcasm will be your undoing, old man.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""That's what I thought." He nods. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's what I thought." He nods. "We'll get back to our game now if you don't mind, *officer*."

fields.Title: Composure: "Just like that. He analysed the sit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just like that. He analysed the situation, accepted the facts and moved on. Like a soldier.

fields.Title: Jump to: [René Arnoux: ""And I thought getting my knee shat..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""You already threw their ball into..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You already threw their ball into the water and took his medal, perhaps we're done bullying these citizens?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm sorry, I think I just fell off..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sorry, I think I just fell off the wagon that's all. I lack character..."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""This deity of yours has quite the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This deity of yours has quite the following in Martinaise..." He straightens his back. "None as zealous as you it seems, though."

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, I shouldn't have hit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, I shouldn't have hit him."

fields.Title: You: ""The 5th?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The 5th?"

fields.Title: Authority: "Say it's *classified*. An old soldi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say it's *classified*. An old soldier should understand.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Everyone can see that, yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everyone can see that, yes."

fields.Title: You: ""Actually nevermind, I don't wanna..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually nevermind, I don't wanna lie."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: "The old carabineer stares at you fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old carabineer stares at you for a moment, then tension leaves him and he asks: "Was there something else you wanted to take from us?"

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""I'm not following you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not following you."

fields.Title: You: ""It was a transcendent event. I saw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was a transcendent event. I saw behind *The Veil*."

fields.Title: You: ""It must have been -- there was a m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It must have been -- there was a magnum-sized bottle in my room..."

fields.Title: You: ""Yet you do not *comprehend* the su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yet you do not *comprehend* the suffering of enlightenment I have endured."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""You're talking about getting black..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're talking about getting black-out shitfaced drunk and going into delirium, right?" he asks impatiently.

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, a man needs to decompress eve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, a man needs to decompress every now and then -- nothing wrong with that -- I got it in check."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Yes, from the looks of it you dese..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, from the looks of it you deserve a medal for the *excellent* handle you have on things." He snorts. "Here, have one of mine!"

fields.Title: Jump to: [René Arnoux: ""And I thought getting my knee shat..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks up from his no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks up from his notes and nods to the old carabineer.

fields.Title: Drama: "Strange, he didn't buy it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Strange, he didn't buy it.

fields.Title: Drama: "Odd, he didn't buy it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Odd, he didn't buy it.

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
You: ""I don't deserve this." (Don't take..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't deserve this." (Don't take the medal.)

fields.Title: René Arnoux: "The veteran extends his right arm w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The veteran extends his right arm with the sun-shaped medal. It glimmers in his wrinkled and scarred palm.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: "The veteran of numerous armed confl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The veteran of numerous armed conflicts extends his right arm with the *Setting Sun* in his clenched fist and an expression of utter disbelief in his eyes.

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
Perception (Sight): "Doesn't look like he's imagining it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Doesn't look like he's imagining it.

fields.Title: Authority: "For a moment frozen in time this ol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For a moment frozen in time this old soldier is your superior officer, inspiring you to be a better man. It feels good. Comforting.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Really?" Suddenly it feels like he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really?" Suddenly it feels like he's entitled to question you. "What was the unit?"

fields.Title: You: ""Asking?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Asking?"

fields.Title: You: ""You tell me.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You tell me."

fields.Title: You: ""Right when you are willing to do j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right when you are willing to do just about anything to make it stop, you open your eyelids..."

fields.Title: You: ""I knocked Cuno out" (Point to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I knocked Cuno out" (Point to the yard.) "The kid needed discipline."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""I'm not gonna dignify this with an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not gonna dignify this with an answer." He frowns. "We're gonna get back to our game now if there isn't anything else, officer?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Something with colours and headwear..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something with colours and headwear. Soldiers identify with those things.

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you, René, I am honoured." (..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you, René, I am honoured." (Reach out your hand.)

fields.Title: René Arnoux: "The carabineer crosses his arms and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The carabineer crosses his arms and spits in the crater.

fields.Title: You: ""No, okay -- we're actually cool no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, okay -- we're actually cool now. I even stole some drugs from his dad."

fields.Title: Untitled hub
Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
René Arnoux: "The man stares at you, silently fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man stares at you, silently frowning.

fields.Title: You: ""My story doesn't have gunfire, blo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My story doesn't have gunfire, blood or spilled guts, but let me give you a *different* take on heroism."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, I admit it -- I got so drunk..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, I admit it -- I got so drunk I forgot even *who* I am."

fields.Title: Volition: "Extremely rigid principles this old..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Extremely rigid principles this old soldier has, don't leave room for a change of heart or backing out. The medal is yours.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Please stop.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please stop."

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
René Arnoux: ""Was there anything else, officer?"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was there anything else, officer?" he asks impatiently. Looks like they both want to continue the game.

fields.Title: You: "Lying just isn't my style. I'd rath..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lying just isn't my style. I'd rather get back to questions.
